synopsis.text: After forming a unique bond over their shared love for eyewear, five high school boys embark on a mission to prove the untapped potential of glasses. Led by Akira Souma, the self-proclaimed 'Glasses Club' at Himaraya Third Technical School aims to revolutionize the world of spectacles by creating functional X-ray glasses. Despite facing challenges such as limited funding and the absence of a club room, these passionate friends remain undeterred. Join them on their thrilling journey filled with laughter, camaraderie, and innovative pursuits as they strive to unveil the extraordinary power hidden behind their lenses. Discover the world of MEGANEBU, where glasses are more than just a fashion statement!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
